Ergonomic Ski Poles: Develop ski poles with an ergonomic grip and handle design that reduces fatigue and improves grip during skiing.
Adjustable Ski Poles: Create ski poles with adjustable lengths and straps, allowing skiers to customize the length and fit to their preference and skill level.
Ski Poles with LED Lights: Add LED lights to the ski poles to improve visibility in low-light conditions or during night skiing, enhancing safety and navigation on the slopes.
Ski Poles with Heated Grips: Develop ski poles with heated grips to keep the skier's hands warm and comfortable during cold weather skiing.
Ski Poles with a Power Bank: Integrate a power bank into the ski poles to allow skiers to charge their devices on the go, ensuring they have access to navigation and communication tools.
